name: Copy of OBRA Furnitech
description:
OBRA FURNITECH is a cutting-edge mobile application designed to revolutionize office furniture planning and design through advanced AI-powered features—now branded as Furnitech. Built for dynamic workspace creators, facility managers, and interior designers, the app integrates intelligent tools such as Floor Plan creation, Assistant Layout guidance, and Office Planner Image Studio to bring office concepts to life with stunning precision.

Key Features:

Furnitech Floor Plan: Quickly create accurate office layouts using device-aware AR tools.

Furnitech Assistant Layout: Get expert layout suggestions tailored to your office needs.

Office Planner Image Studio: Generate and customize realistic furniture placement visuals.

Secure User Authentication: Mandatory signup ensures access control and personalized experiences.

Visitor Activity Logger: Maintain app security by monitoring visitor device and usage data.

OBRA FURNITECH empowers professionals to streamline office furniture planning with AI-enhanced innovation—making workspace design smarter, faster, and visually impactful.
